JUDGES: Corneliu Bîrsan;Egbert Myjer;Ineta Ziemele;Josep Casadevall;Luis López Guerra
TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . He was represented before the Court by Mr J. Jerman , a lawyer practising in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , Mr PERSON , ORG Attorney - General .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant instituted proceedings against FAC in ORG ( PERSON ) seeking payment in the amount of MONEY ( DEM ) ( MONEY ( ORG ) ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged a request for an interim measure .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged a claim against FAC ( the wife of GPE ) and the proceedings were joined .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG came into force with regard to GPE .
CARDINAL . DATE and QUANTITY DATE the applicant lodged CARDINAL requests for a hearing to be set .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( Okrožno sodišče v Mariboru ) issued a first - instance judgment . The defendants appealed .

CARDINAL . On DATE the appeal court ( PERSON ) issued a judgment , upholding CARDINAL part of the first - instance judgment and remitting the remainder for re - examination ( default interest and costs ) .
CARDINAL . Subsequently , the defendants lodged an appeal on points of law with ORG sodišče ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG rejected this appeal .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG issued a judgement regarding default interest and costs . The judgement became final on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant instituted execution proceedings with ORG against GPE and GPE
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG issued a writ for execution .
CARDINAL . Subsequently , ORG appointed an expert and the applicant lodged several requests for determination of a date for the public auction .
CARDINAL . The proceedings ended on DATE , when the amount due was paid and the decision terminating the proceedings was issued ( ustavitev postopka ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the respondent Government were given notice of the present application .

CARDINAL . On DATE the State Attorney ’s ORG sent a settlement proposal to the applicant under LAW of the LAW on the Protection of the Right to a Trial without undue Delay ( “ the CARDINAL Act ” ) . In its proposal , the ORG Attorney ’s ORG acknowledged that the right to a trial within a reasonable time has been violated and offered to pay monetary compensation in the amount of MONEY ( ORG ) in respect of non - pecuniary damage .
CARDINAL . Subsequently , the applicant informed the ORG Attorney ’s ORG that he was not willing to accept the proposal as the sum offered was too low .
CARDINAL . See domestic law in the ORG ’s decisions PERSON v. GPE ( ( dec . ) , no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , DATE ) ) and PERSON v. GPE ( ( dec . ) , GPE , DATE ) .
